remarks: The equality of two translations is determined by their equality at atoms not under co-atom ` W ` .  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jun-2013.)
statement:
ltrne.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrne.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrne.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrne.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrneq $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) -> ( A. p e. A ( -. p .<_ W -> ( F ` p ) = ( G ` p ) ) <-> F = G ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d F p $.
$d G p $.
$d H p $.
$d K p $.
$d T p $.
$d W p $.
